message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $875000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
